descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is the third quarter of a three-quarter sequence of Intermediate German. Students will continue to increase their proficiency in speaking, listening, reading, and writing German. We will read and work with Kafka's Die Verwandlung (Metamorphosis). To conclude the year we will also study and discuss recent political and cultural debates in Germany.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Continued development of all language skills as well as familiarization with an important German literary text of the 20th century and an insight into the 21 century Germany.
